National Champions |BowlTourney= Rose Bowl |BowlTourneyResult= Win, 28-0, [[1920 Ohio State Buckeyes football team|Ohio State]] }} The 1920 California Golden Bears represented the [[University of California, Berkeley]]. The Golden Bears offense scored 510 points while the defense allowed 14 points.http://cfreference.net/cfr/school.s?id=251&season=1920 Led by head coach [[Andy Smith (coach)|Andy Smith]], the Golden Bears finished with an undefeated season.
